owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.proof: The merkle proof, generated offchain and passed from the frontend.
params.sAmount: The total amount the user is entitled to at init time.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addMerkleData(bytes32).notice: Add merkle tree data to the contract.

claim(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Claims the amount the user is entitled to.

claimable(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Returns the total amount currently claimable by the user.

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Emergency withdraws all funds to contract owner. This is only to use in extreme circumstances

remainingBalance(uint256,bytes32[]).notice: Returns the total remaining balance the for the calling user.

totalSupply().notice: The total supply of tokens remaining in the contract.
